HAPPY BIRTHDAY VERLA!!!!!

We thought we would use this method to send you birthday greetings from some of the folks who won't be seeing you in person (and maybe some of those who will). Hope you are having a wonderful time and being waited on hand and foot! May you have many, many more! We'll drink a toast to you and be thinking of you wherever we are.
